    Marcelo Mendes Disconzi

    • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8722058858591752
    • Última atualização do currículo em 31/12/2015

    Marcelo Mendes Disconzi is an Assistant Professor of Mathematics at Vanderbilt University, USA. He has earned his PhD from the State University of New York at Stony Brook (SUNY Stony Brook). His research interests are partial differential equations, geometric analysis, and mathematical physics. An up-to-date CV can be found at: http://www.disconzi.net/Research/CV.pdf and more information at: http://www.disconzi.net/ (Texto informado pelo autor)
